devdoc.author: Metis Network Team
devdoc.details: Implementation of DataTokenFactory *      DataTokenFactory deploys DataToken proxy contracts.     New DataToken proxy contracts are links to the template contract's bytecode.     Proxy contract functionality is based on implementation of ERC1167 standard.

constructor.details: constructor     Called on contract deployment. Could not be called with zero address parameters.

params._template: refers to the address of a deployed DataToken contract.

createToken(string,string,uint256,uint25.details: Deploys new DataToken proxy contract.     Template contract address could not be a zero address.

params.name: token name
params.proof: proof represents the relationship between data and token

createToken(string,string,uint256,uint25.return: address of a new proxy DataToken contract
